players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana has been found dead so early in the game. Let us be vigilant and ensure we trust only those we can truly rely on."
Charlie: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other and work together to figure out what happened to Diana."
Charlie: "I'd like to propose that we all share any unusual or suspicious occurrences during the night. This will help us work together and keep each other informed."

You: "I had a strange dream last night. In my dream, I saw Diana talking with someone in the shadows. She seemed uneasy and was whispering something to them. I can't be sure if it was real or just a figment of my imagination, but..."
